newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE white sugar ends down after NY specs bale ou.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE white sugar ends down after NY specs bale ou.

text.p: London white sugar ended down after speculators finally moved to liquidate hefty net long positions in the New York market, traders said on Friday.
August, the most heavily traded position, last traded $3.30 lower at $320.00. October was down $2.90 at $315.00. Total volume amounted to a solid 3,282 lots.
London took its cue from the US sell-off although end-users were quick to buy back August positions at the lows.
"There's an awful lot of buying in the whites. It's following New York but not by anything like the same degree," said one trader.
